mapper.select: select EVENT_START as event_start, EVENT_END as event_end, EVENT_TITLE as event_title, EVENT_CONTENT as event_content, EVENT_WRITER as event_writer, EVENT_COLOR as event_color from s_calendar
mapper.insert: insert into S_CALENDAR (STUDY_NO, CAL_NO, EVENT_START, EVENT_END, EVENT_WRITER, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_COLOR) values (20, 1, #{event_start}, #{event_end}, 'cj', #{event_title}, #{event_content}, #{event_color} )
